_comment: Forbidden Russian Services - Ukrainian IT Export Protection (Integrated v3.0)
description: Comprehensive blacklist of russian services, libraries, and practices that pose critical risks for Ukrainian IT export. Usage in EU/US client projects can lead to contract termination, fines, and reputational damage.

threat_levels.CRITICAL: Direct security threat - data sent to russian state servers, sanctions violations
threat_levels.HIGH: Russian commercial service - potential data sharing with state, legal risk
threat_levels.MEDIUM: Russian service - compliance and reputation risk

categories.name: Аналітика та трекінг (CRITICAL)
categories.description: Analytics services that collect user data. Usage violates GDPR and sanctions regimes.

services.name: Yandex Metrika
services.reason: Russian state-controlled analytics. All data accessible to russian government under SORM laws.

services.name: Яндекс.Вебвізор
services.reason: Screen recording and session replay sent to russian servers

services.name: Top.Mail.ru Counter
services.reason: VK (Mail.ru Group) - russian state-affiliated. Data collection in russia.

services.name: Рамблер/топ-100
services.reason: Russian analytics service

services.name: LiveInternet
services.reason: Russian counter service

categories.name: Соціальні мережі та віджети (CRITICAL)
categories.description: Any embedding of these services loads code from their servers, sets cookies, and transmits user data to russian jurisdiction.

services.name: VK (ВКонтакте) Widgets / SDK / Pixel
services.reason: Sanctioned company (VK Group). Controlled by russian state. Direct FSB access to all data.

services.name: Odnoklassniki (OK.ru)
services.reason: Part of VK Group. Under sanctions.

services.name: Telegram Widgets (official from telegram.org)
services.reason: Unclear jurisdiction (Dubai?), but infrastructure and team largely in russia/CIS. EU contracts often prohibit connections to high-risk jurisdictions.
alternatives: Custom chat implementation via Telegram API
services.note: Use with extreme caution. Verify data flows before deployment.

categories.name: Карти та геосервіси (HIGH RISK)
categories.description: Geolocation data is confidential. Transmission to russian jurisdiction is unacceptable.

services.name: Yandex Maps API / SDK
services.reason: Sanctions. User location data sent to russia.
alternatives: Google Maps API (US jurisdiction, acceptable for most EU clients)

services.name: 2GIS Maps API
services.reason: Russian company with infrastructure in russia. Sanctions risk.

categories.name: Платежі та фінанси (CRITICAL)
categories.description: Direct contact with sanctioned financial systems - fastest path to contract termination.

services.name: YooKassa / Яндекс.Касса
services.reason: Sanctioned russian payment processor. Legal and financial risk.

services.name: QIWI
services.reason: Russian payment system. Under sanctions.

services.name: WebMoney
services.reason: Russian-origin payment system

services.name: Sberbank Online / API
services.reason: Under international sanctions. Any integration is violation.

categories.name: Хостинг, CDN та інфраструктура (CRITICAL)
categories.description: Hosting client data on russian infrastructure or sanctioned companies.

services.name: Yandex Cloud / Object Storage / Compute
services.reason: Sanctions. Physical servers in russia.

services.name: Yandex CDN
services.reason: Russian CDN - code injection risk, data leakage, performance issues

services.name: Mail.ru CDN
services.reason: Russian state-affiliated CDN

services.name: Selectel
services.reason: Russian hosting provider. Infrastructure in russia.

services.name: Russian VPS/VDS providers (Reg.ru, Timeweb, Majordomo)
services.reason: Infrastructure and jurisdiction in russia.

categories.name: Шрифти та ассети (HIDDEN RISK)
categories.description: Loading assets from .ru domains - not only sanctions risk, but also performance (blocked in EU) and security (MITM attacks).

services.name: Yandex Fonts
services.reason: Sanctions. Dependency on russian server. Tracking via font loading.

services.name: Any assets from .ru / .su / .рф domains
services.reason: Russian jurisdiction, sanctions, blocking risk.
alternatives: Use own CDN or EU/US services (Cloudflare, AWS)

categories.name: Відеохостинг (CRITICAL)
categories.description: Russian state propaganda platforms. Unacceptable for EU/US clients.

services.name: Rutube
services.reason: Russian state propaganda platform

services.name: VK Video
services.reason: Russian state-controlled video platform (VK Group)

categories.name: Пошук (HIGH RISK)
categories.description: Search queries contain sensitive business data. Transmission to russia is unacceptable.

services.name: Yandex Search Widget
services.reason: Russian search engine - query tracking

categories.name: E-commerce інтеграції (HIGH RISK)
categories.description: Sanctions and business risk. Russian e-commerce platforms.

services.name: Wildberries SDK
services.reason: Russian e-commerce platform - sanctions risk

services.name: Ozon SDK
services.reason: Russian e-commerce - sanctions, legal risk

categories.name: CAPTCHA (HIGH RISK)
categories.description: User behavior tracking sent to russian servers.

services.name: Yandex SmartCaptcha
services.reason: Russian captcha service - behavior tracking

categories.name: Розробка та API (SUPPLY CHAIN RISK)
categories.description: Libraries and services that may contain backdoors, collect metrics, or stop being maintained.

services.name: NPM packages from suspicious authors (.ru emails, russian-themed pseudonyms)
services.reason: Risk of vulnerabilities, intentional malicious code (supply-chain attack), or sudden package closure.
alternatives: Find alternatives with active maintainer from EU/US/Ukraine
services.note: Dynamic list - requires scanner. Check npm author emails and package origins.

services.name: APIs of any russian commercial services (weather, translator, SMS)
services.reason: Data transmission (even non-PII) to sanctioned jurisdiction.

categories.name: Корпоративне ПЗ (санкції 2024)
categories.description: Russian enterprise software sanctioned in 2024. Using in Ukrainian or EU/US client projects creates legal and security risk.

services.name: Bitrix24 / 1C-Bitrix
services.reason: 1C and Bitrix24 under Ukraine sanctions until 2033. Russian company with data access obligations under russian law.

services.name: AmoCRM / Kommo
services.reason: Russian CRM company (rebranded to Kommo internationally). Data processing in russia.

services.name: GetCourse
services.reason: Russian e-learning platform. User data in russian jurisdiction.

services.name: Unisender
services.reason: Russian email marketing service.

services.name: Sendsay
services.reason: Russian email/SMS automation platform.

categories.name: Антивірус та Security ПЗ (US ban 2024)
categories.description: Russian security software banned by US Commerce Department in 2024. Represents supply chain risk and potential backdoors.

services.name: Kaspersky Lab
services.reason: US Commerce Department ban (June 2024). Antivirus with full system access — highest risk for data exfiltration.

services.name: Dr.Web
services.reason: Russian antivirus. System-level access. Potential backdoors and data collection.

categories.name: Банківські API (під санкціями)
categories.description: Russian banking APIs and payment services under US/EU/Ukraine sanctions.

services.name: Tinkoff / Т-Банк API
services.reason: Sanctioned by US OFAC and EU. Any API integration violates sanctions.

services.name: Alfa-Bank Russia
services.reason: Russian bank under sanctions. Note: Alfa-Bank Ukraine (now Sense Bank) is a separate entity.

services.name: VTB Bank
services.reason: State-owned russian bank. Under US/EU/Ukraine sanctions.

services.name: Raiffeisen Bank Russia
services.reason: Austrian bank's russian subsidiary. Under pressure to exit russia. Data in russian jurisdiction.
services.note: Raiffeisen Austria HQ is safe. Only raiffeisen.ru is flagged.

categories.name: VK Cloud / Mail.ru Cloud (CRITICAL)
categories.description: Cloud infrastructure owned by VK Group (formerly Mail.ru Group). Sanctioned company with physical servers in russia.

services.name: VK Cloud (former Mail.ru Cloud Solutions)
services.reason: VK Group is under US/EU/Ukraine sanctions. All data accessible to russian FSB.

services.name: Mail.ru Cloud Storage
services.reason: Mail.ru Group (VK Group) — state-affiliated. Data in russia.

services.name: Cloud.ru (VK Cloud rebrand)
services.reason: New brand of VK Cloud (2023 rebrand). Same infrastructure, same russian FSB access.
services.note: Pattern uses trailing slash 'cloud.ru/' to avoid false positives with 'cloudrun', 'cloud.ruby', etc.

whitelist._comment: Safe alternatives - Western and Ukrainian services

ukrainian_law.basis: Wartime regulations protect citizen data from hostile state surveillance
ukrainian_law.risk: Using russian services exposes Ukrainian user data to russian intelligence
ukrainian_law.penalties: Reputational damage, legal liability, sanctions violations, B2B contract breaches

gdpr.issue: Russian services do not comply with GDPR Article 44-50 (international data transfers)
gdpr.violations: Data transfers to russia without adequacy decision, no valid SCCs, no user consent
gdpr.solution: Use EU/US-based services with GDPR compliance

sanctions.financial: Many russian services under US/EU/UK sanctions
sanctions.risk: Business account closure, legal penalties, inability to work with Western clients

seo_impact._comment: Removing russian trackers IMPROVES SEO, not harms it
benefits: Faster page load (no russian CDN delays from EU)
Improved trust signals (no suspicious russian tracking)
GDPR compliance = better EU search rankings

myths.myth: Blocking Yandex hurts SEO in Ukraine
myths.reality: Yandex has <1% market share in Ukraine (2025). Google dominates 95%+. Zero SEO impact.
Google Analytics 4 provides same data + better international insights + GDPR compliance + faster loading

myths.myth: Russian CDN is faster for UA users
myths.reality: Cloudflare/jsDelivr are FASTER from Ukraine due to EU edge locations. Benchmark: yastatic.net ~80ms, cdn.jsdelivr.net ~25ms (Kyiv)

migration_guide._comment: Quick migration from russian to safe alternatives
steps: 1. Audit: Run ./scripts/seo-check.sh to find all russian trackers
2. Identify: Check threat level and alternatives in this file
3. Replace: Use replacement_guide examples or alternatives list
5. Deploy: Push to production after verification
6. Monitor: Check no russian requests in browser Network tab
migration_guide.timeline: Most migrations take 1-2 hours per category
migration_guide.automation: Use pre-commit hooks to prevent re-introduction

meta.warning: This list is minimum. Risk depends on context. Even 'neutral' services (e.g., Google Fonts) may be problematic for strict GDPR clients without proper Data Processing Agreements.
meta.recommendation: Automate verification. Integrate into CI/CD. Be paranoid - it's professional.
meta.sources: Based on Ukrainian product incidents (2024-2025), EU auditor requirements, OFAC/EU/Ukraine sanctions lists
